description: Targus ACH103US USB 2.0 4- Port Bend-A-Hub With Mini USB Adapter allows users to instantly connect up to 4 USB devices including mice, keyboards, printers and more to a laptop PC or Mac.This uniquely flexible hub is ideal for connecting multiple USB devices with large or wide connectors and conveniently rolls up for easy storage during travel. The Bend-a-Hub features two specialty connectors, one can easily adjust to a 90 degree angle for easy accessibility. Another connector converts to a mini-USB to power and charge a number of digital cameras, cell phones or PDA devices. The 4-Port Bend-a-Hub draws power from the USB port and requires no external power supply, making this a perfect connectivity solution for a user on-the-go.
title: Targus 4-Port USB 2.0 Bend-a-Hub with Mini USB Adapter ACH103US (Black)
